trans-unit.source: The type of the dependency property that has changed.
trans-unit.target: 发生更改的依赖属性的类型。

trans-unit.source: Provides data about a change in value to a dependency property as reported by particular routed events, including the previous and current value of the property that changed.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关依赖属性值更改的数据（由特定的路由事件报告），其中包含发生更改的属性的旧值和新值。

trans-unit.source: This is a generic class where the class is used for event data of different events.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个泛型类，类用于不同的事件的事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Different routed events can specify the type constraint of the generic to produce a type-specific event data class.
trans-unit.target: 不同的路由的事件可以指定的类型约束的泛型才能生成特定类型的事件数据类。

trans-unit.source: Once the class is constrained, the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedPropertyChangedEventArgs%601.OldValue%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.RoutedPropertyChangedEventArgs%601.NewValue%2A> properties also reflect these type constraints; thus you can use a common event data class for different property changed events without requiring different delegates for each possible property type.
trans-unit.target: 一旦类受到约束，<xref:System.Windows.RoutedPropertyChangedEventArgs%601.OldValue%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.RoutedPropertyChangedEventArgs%601.NewValue%2A>属性还反映这些类型约束; 因此你可以使用常用的事件数据类的不同属性更改事件而无需对每个可能的不同的委托属性类型。

trans-unit.source: Routed events that reports a property change where the delegate incorporates this event data class include <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.ValueChanged>, where the type constraint (and old and new values passed in the arguments) is of type <xref:System.Double>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItemChanged>, where the type constraint is <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: 报告在委托中合并此事件数据类的属性更改的路由的事件包括<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.ValueChanged>，其中的类型约束 （和旧值和新值参数中传递） 的类型是<xref:System.Double>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItemChanged>，其中类型约束是<xref:System.Object>。

trans-unit.source: Previous value of the property, prior to the event being raised.
trans-unit.target: 属性在引发事件之前的旧值。

trans-unit.source: Current value of the property at the time of the event.
trans-unit.target: 属性在引发事件时的新值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.RoutedPropertyChangedEventArgs`1" /> class, with provided old and new values.
trans-unit.target: 使用提供的旧值和新值初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.RoutedPropertyChangedEventArgs`1" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The types passed must match the declared constraints of the specific generic.
trans-unit.target: 传递的类型必须匹配特定的泛型声明的约束。

trans-unit.source: Previous value of the property, prior to the event being raised.
trans-unit.target: 属性在引发事件之前的旧值。

trans-unit.source: Current value of the property at the time of the event.
trans-unit.target: 属性在引发事件时的新值。

trans-unit.source: Identifier of the routed event that this arguments class carries information for.
trans-unit.target: 此参数类带有其信息的路由事件的标识符。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.RoutedPropertyChangedEventArgs`1" /> class, with provided old and new values, and an event identifier.
trans-unit.target: 使用提供的旧值和新值以及事件标识符初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.RoutedPropertyChangedEventArgs`1" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The types passed for `oldValue` and `newValue` must match the declared constraints of the specific generic.
trans-unit.target: 为传递的类型`oldValue`和`newValue`必须匹配特定的泛型声明的约束。

trans-unit.source: The generic handler to call in a type-specific way.
trans-unit.target: 以特定于类型的方式调用的一般处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The target to call the handler on.
trans-unit.target: 要对其调用处理程序的目标。

trans-unit.source: Invokes event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase event system efficiency.
trans-unit.target: 以特定于类型的方式调用事件处理程序，这样做可以提高事件系统效率。

trans-unit.source: This implementation casts the generic handler as a <xref:System.Windows.RoutedPropertyChangedEventHandler%601> and then invokes it.
trans-unit.target: 此实现将强制转换为的泛型处理程序<xref:System.Windows.RoutedPropertyChangedEventHandler%601>，然后调用它。

trans-unit.source: For details on this implementation pattern and the reasons for it, see <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A> and [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关此实现模式和它的原因的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A>和[路由事件概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the new value of a property as reported by a property changed event.
trans-unit.target: 获取由属性更改事件报告的属性的新值。

trans-unit.source: The generic value.
trans-unit.target: 泛型值。

trans-unit.source: In a practical implementation of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.RoutedPropertyChangedEventArgs`1" />, the generic type of this property is replaced with the constrained type of the implementation.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.RoutedPropertyChangedEventArgs`1" /> 的实际实现中，此属性的泛型类型将替换为该实现的约束类型。

trans-unit.source: The value and type constraint of this property will be established by the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值和类型约束将建立的构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Gets the previous value of the property as reported by a property changed event.
trans-unit.target: 获取由属性更改事件报告的属性的旧值。

trans-unit.source: The generic value.
trans-unit.target: 泛型值。

trans-unit.source: In a practical implementation of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.RoutedPropertyChangedEventArgs`1" />, the generic type of this property is replaced with the constrained type of the implementation.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.RoutedPropertyChangedEventArgs`1" /> 的实际实现中，此属性的泛型类型将替换为该实现的约束类型。

trans-unit.source: The value and type constraint of this property will be established by the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedPropertyChangedEventArgs%601> constructor's type arguments.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值和类型约束将通过建立<xref:System.Windows.RoutedPropertyChangedEventArgs%601>构造函数的类型自变量。
